item.description:
Our Santa's helper was able to get us $6.00 off per ticket so admission to the show is $12.00 a person "What A Steal "

Lets take A Break from the holiday madness and Spend the evening Laughing with friends at the Jokers Wild !

Tommy Koenig has headlined at every major stand-up venue in the United States, working alongside performers such as Jerry Seinfeld, Ray Romano, and Eddie Murphy.He has won numerous awards and performed all over the world. Tommy is a hard-working actor/comedian with 20 years in the business and a diverse body of work including roles in film, (Robin Hood: Men in Tights, Dracula Dead and Loving it, Stitches, etc.) stage, (A View From The Bridge, The Tooth of Crime, The Basic Training of Pablo Hummel) and television (Miami Vice, Not Necessarily The News...) Also performing kendra Cunningham.

We Can get there early and have a light dinner or share some appetizers :-) the Show Starts at 8pm,

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: A Night of Laughter With Friends :-) Santa's little Helper Up Date
